description: VMAlertNotifierSpec defines the notifier url for sending information about alerts

bearerTokenSecret.description: Optional bearer auth token to use for -remoteWrite.url

headers.description: Headers allow configuring custom http headers Must be in form of semicolon separated header with value e.g. headerName:headerValue vmalert supports it since 1.79.0 version

selector.description: Selector allows service discovery for alertmanager in this case all matched vmalertmanager replicas will be added into vmalert notifier.url as statefulset pod.fqdn
